title: The Veg Head
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A low impact, ecological food service carry out. Uses separate grills, one for preparing vegetarian food and the other for non-vegetarian food. Sandwiches and wraps are served on whole grain bread and shells. Around 95% of in house products are composted or recycled.
